P

PointLight - Class in Core.Lightning
The PointLight class represents a point light source in a 3D scene.
PointLight(Vector3f, Vector3f, float) - Constructor for class Core.Lightning.PointLight
Constructs a new PointLight with the specified color, position, and intensity.
PointLight(Vector3f, Vector3f, float, float, float, float) - Constructor for class Core.Lightning.PointLight
Constructs a new PointLight with the specified color, position, intensity, constant, linear, and exponent.
prepare(Entity, Camera) - Method in class Core.Managers.RenderManager
Prepares an entity for rendering by setting transformation and view matrices.
processEntity(Entity) - Method in class Core.Managers.RenderManager
Processes an entity for rendering by adding it to the list of entities for its model.
processVertex(int, int, int, List<Vector2f>, List<Vector3f>, List<Integer>, float[], float[]) - Static method in class Core.Managers.ObjectLoader
Processes a vertex in the OBJ file and updates the corresponding lists.
